login_subtitle: Sign in to manage your deliveries

language_change_info: The language will be applied immediately to the entire application

no_purchase_found: No purchase found for this payment.
client_not_found: Client not found or does not match
error_loading_greater_than_or_equal: Error loading greater than or equal
error_loading_less_than_or_equal: Error loading less than or equal
security_logout_message: For security reasons, you will be logged out. Please log back in with your new password.
privacy_policy_content: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
privacy_introduction_content: BBD Limited is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, share and protect your information in the context of our logistics and business management application.
privacy_collection_content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when using the application, particularly during account creation, business partner management, financial transactions and logistics operations.
privacy_data_types_content:
• Identification data: name, first name, username, email address, phone number
• Professional data: role, access permissions
• Business data: partner information, transactions, payments, purchases
• Logistics data: containers, warehouses, ports, shipments, packages
• Financial data: balances, debts, currencies, exchange rates
• Connection data: login timestamps, IP address
privacy_usage_content:
Your data is used to:
• Provide and maintain application services
• Manage user accounts and authorizations
• Process business and financial transactions
• Track logistics operations and inventories
• Generate business reports and analytics
• Ensure security and prevent fraud
• Communicate with you regarding our services
privacy_sharing_content:
We do not sell, exchange or rent your personal data to third parties. Your data may only be shared in the following cases:
• With your explicit consent
• With our technical service providers (hosting, security)
• To comply with legal or regulatory obligations
• To protect our rights and the security of our users
privacy_protection_content:
We implement robust security measures to protect your data:
• Encryption of data in transit and at rest
• Secure authentication and password management
• Role-based access control
• Continuous security monitoring
• Regular and secure backups
• Staff training on data protection
privacy_rights_content:
In accordance with GDPR and applicable laws, you have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Correct or update your information
• Request deletion of your data
• Limit the processing of your data
• Port your data to another service
• Object to the processing of your data
• Withdraw your consent at any time
privacy_retention_content:
We retain your personal data only for the time necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
• Account data: as long as your account is active
• Transaction data: 7 years (legal obligation)
• Connection data: 12 months
• Deleted data: maximum 30 days before permanent deletion
privacy_contact_content:
For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us:
• Email: privacy@bbd-limited.com
• Phone: +33 1 23 45 67 89
• Address: BBD Limited, 123 Logistics Street, 75001 Paris, France

We will respond to your request within 30 days.
